title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Discussing controversial topics might require extra caution and thoughtfulness today. Youre bound to encounter people who, for various reasons, feel alienated or offended by off-the-cuff remarks. Take their feelings seriously and politely apologize, even if you dont agree with their opinions. Although your desire for connection is well-intentioned, stay mindful that you dont try too hard or chatter too much. Trust that your empathy and respect is enough for everyone to feel heard and esteemed. Theres so much you can learn when you just listen. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
